value:
$nMPID_チキ|I got so much candy... I'd love to
share some with you. Come on!

$nMPID_ニニアン|Tiki is an exceptional girl...$k$pShe's broken down the wall between
humans and dragons with the power
of her smile.

$nMPID_ニニアン|Thank you for bringing us here...$k$pYou've even been nice enough
to give us these costumes for
the festival!

$nMPID_チキ|Oh! Xane is here too! He looks like
he's up to no good... I need to stop
him from playing tricks on people!

$nMPID_ニニアン|Hehe. Tiki is always so full of energy!
It reminds me of when my brother,
Nils, was this age.

$nMPID_チキ|I'm Tiki! I've come
from $Nf's
castle to play!

$nMPID_チキ|What a lot of fun this harvest festival
is! I wish it could go on forever!

$nMPID_チキ|Rawr! Tricked you by turning into
a dragon! Were you frightened?

$nMPID_ニニアン|Tiki, are you all right? Be
careful!

$nMPID_ニニアン|You've made Tiki so happy...
Thank you.

I'm Tiki! I'm going to play with
my friend Ninian as much as I
can! I can't wait!

$nMPID_チキ|Thank you for playing with me
today, Ninian! I had ever so
much fun!$k$p$nMPID_ニニアン|I had fun too, Tiki. I only have a
little brother, but today...it was
like I had a little sister too.$k$p$nMPID_チキ|Thank you for inviting us to the
festival, $Nu.$k$pI've met so many nice people... I
was alone for so long, but today
has been like a wonderful dream.$k$pI've made more new friends than
I could have ever imagined! *sniff*$k$p$nMPID_ニニアン|Don't cry, Tiki! I'll stay by your side
from now on. I'll make sure you're
never alone again. I promise.
やぁーっ
お化けだよ！
きゃああっ
いじめないで…
$nMPID_二人|Candy, please!
$nMPID_二人|Ninian! I'm here!
$nMPID_チキ|Tricky Tiki!
$nMPID_ニニアン|It's harvest season!
Oh, no...
I wanted to play more...
I'll join the fun.
I'll keep you safe.

• We're spooky!
• Um... Grr...ooo!

• With me!
• Got it!
Ooh! Hee hee!

• I'm gonna scare Mar-Mar so bad his hair will turn white!
• Don't go overboard, Tiki.
Where to?
Mmmm... Yummy!
Boo! Did I scare you?

$nMPID_チキ|Ohh, look at it all! I can't believe we
got so much candy!

$nMPID_ニニアン|Indeed we did... In fact, I daresay
the two of us can't eat it all on our
own. What a shame.

$nMPID_チキ|That's no problem! We'll share it with
Mar-Mar.

$nMPID_ニニアン|You mean Prince Marth? That's a
splendid idea. Hmm... Who else might
like some?

$nMPID_チキ|Umm... Maybe Prince Alfonse? And
the summoner too!

They're both real nice! They're my
favorite people in the whole wide
world! Er... The whole wide worlds?

$nMPID_ニニアン|Are they now? That's wonderful
to hear, Tiki.

$nMPID_チキ|When I'm feeling lonely, the prince's
sister always plays with me too. So
let's share with her as well!

But the lady with the ponytail gets
grumpy when I eat too many sweets,
so maybe not her...

But we can share with the icy
princess! And the pale sad lady...
and the cute butterfly lady too!

$nMPID_ニニアン|Hm, perhaps we'll actually need more
candy than we have...
$nMPID_チキ|What's wrong?

$nMPID_ニニアン|Oh, I was just thinking about how
many humans you've befriended
despite being a dragon like me.

You've set a wonderful example. And
I think I'm ready to follow suit... Yet, I
must admit I have lingering doubts.

$nMPID_チキ|Well, don't you worry. If anyone's
mean to you, Mar-Mar will beat 'em
up! Like... Boom! Bam!

Oh, it's lunchtime! Humans love
eating together. It's the best way to
make friends! Come on!

$nMPID_ニニアン|Hehe, is that so? Then let's see just
how good an impression candy for
lunch can make...
